articles.title: Filipa Patão shared her thoughts on becoming the inaugural head coach of Boston Legacy FC
articles.description:
Patão joins Boston from Portuguese powerhouse Benfica. Acclimating to the area has meant "trying new things," including lobster rolls.

The post Filipa Patão shared her thoughts on becoming the inaugural head coach of Boston Legacy FC appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Filipa Patão becomes inaugural head coach of Boston Legacy FC, enhancing local women's soccer.
Patão joins from Benfica, bringing international experience to Boston's sports community.
Her adaptation includes trying local cuisine, fostering community engagement among residents.

articles.title: Jeremy Swayman feels like a ‘completely different human being’ a year removed from contract dispute
articles.description:
"If I didn't have that experience, I probably wouldn't understand the importance of it."

The post Jeremy Swayman feels like a ‘completely different human being’ a year removed from contract dispute appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jeremy Swayman reflects on personal growth after last year's contract dispute with the Bruins.
Swayman emphasizes the importance of the experience for his development as a player.
Boston residents can expect a more focused and resilient Swayman in the upcoming NHL season.
